movies.title: The Lord of The Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.synopsis: A Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

movies.title: The Lord of The Rings: The Two Towers
movies.synopsis: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

movies.title: The Lord of The Rings: The Return of the King
movies.synopsis: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

movies.title: Midsommar
movies.synopsis: A couple travels to Northern Europe to visit a rural hometown's fabled Swedish mid-summer festival. What begins as an idyllic retreat quickly devolves into an increasingly violent and bizarre competition at the hands of a pagan cult.

movies.title: Hereditary
movies.synopsis: A grieving family is haunted by tragic and disturbing occurrences.

movies.title: Hercules
movies.synopsis: The son of Zeus and Hera is stripped of his immortality as an infant and must become a true hero in order to reclaim it.

movies.title: Pocahontas
movies.synopsis: An English soldier and the daughter of an Algonquin chief share a romance when English colonists invade seventeenth century Virginia.

movies.title: Irish Wish
movies.synopsis: When the love of her life gets engaged to her friend, Maddie puts her feelings aside to be a bridesmaid at their wedding in Ireland. Days before the wedding, Maddie makes a spontaneous wish for true love, only to wake up as the bride-to-be.

movies.title: Alien
movies.synopsis: The crew of a spacecraft, Nostromo, intercept a distress signal from a planet and set out to investigate it. However, to their horror, they are attacked by an alien which later invades their ship.

movies.title: The Lobster
movies.synopsis: In a futuristic world, single people are taken to The Hotel to find a lover within a span of 45 days. However, the hotel has a condition if they fail to find a partner.

movies.title: Winter's Tale
movies.synopsis: Peter, a thief raised by a supernatural demon, goes to Beverly Penn's mansion in an attempt to rob it. Instead, he falls in love with Beverly, who is about to die of poison.

movies.title: Lucy
movies.synopsis: When Lucy unknowingly becomes part of a drug trade, sinister individuals insert medications in her body. They then give her unique abilities, which she uses to gain vengeance against her perpetrators.

movies.title: Barbie
movies.synopsis: Barbie and Ken are having the time of their lives in the colorful and seemingly perfect world of Barbie Land. However, when they get a chance to go to the real world, they soon discover the joys and perils of living among humans.

movies.title: About Time
movies.synopsis: Like all the men in his family, Tim Lake possesses the power to travel in time. With the advice of his father, he uses his special ability to pursue his romantic interest, Mary.

movies.title: Spirited Away
movies.synopsis: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

movies.title: Inglourious Basterds
movies.synopsis: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

movies.title: The Avengers
movies.synopsis: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

movies.title: Lost in Translation
movies.synopsis: A faded movie star and a neglected young woman form an unlikely bond after crossing paths in Tokyo.

movies.title: Clueless
movies.synopsis: Shallow, rich and socially successful Cher is at the top of her Beverly Hills high school's pecking scale. Seeing herself as a matchmaker, Cher first coaxes two teachers into dating each other.

movies.title: 10 things I hate about you
movies.synopsis: A high-school boy, Cameron, cannot date Bianca until her anti-social older sister, Kat, has a boyfriend. So, Cameron pays a mysterious boy, Patrick, to charm Kat.

movies.title: Alice in Wonderland
movies.synopsis: Nineteen-year-old Alice returns to the magical world from her childhood adventure, where she reunites with her old friends and learns of her true destiny: to end the Red Queen's reign of terror.

movies.title: Twilight
movies.synopsis: When Bella Swan moves to a small town in the Pacific Northwest, she falls in love with Edward Cullen, a mysterious classmate who reveals himself to be a 108-year-old vampire.

movies.title: The Twilight Saga: New Moon
movies.synopsis: After Bella's birthday party, Edward leaves Bella, and she turns to Jacob for comfort, but danger lurks in the form of a vengeful vampire.

movies.title: The Twilight Saga: Eclipse
movies.synopsis: Bella must choose between her love for Edward and her friendship with Jacob as an army of newborn vampires led by Victoria comes after her.

movies.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 1
movies.synopsis: Bella and Edward's marriage and honeymoon are cut short when Bella discovers she is pregnant, leading to complications and dangers.

movies.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 2
movies.synopsis: After the birth of Renesmee, the Cullens gather other vampire clans to protect the child from a false allegation that puts the family in front of the Volturi.

movies.title: Back to the Future
movies.synopsis: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

movies.title: Cars
movies.synopsis: On the way to the biggest race of his life, a hotshot rookie race car gets stranded in a rundown town and learns that winning isn't everything in life.

movies.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
movies.synopsis: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate 'Captain' Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

movies.title: Falling for Christmas
movies.synopsis: In the days leading up to Christmas, a young and newly engaged heiress experiences a skiing accident. After being diagnosed with amnesia, she finds herself in the care of the handsome lodge owner and his daughter.

movies.title: Do Revenge
movies.synopsis: After a clandestine run-in, Drea (Alpha, fallen it girl) and Eleanor (beta, new alt girl) team up to go after each other's tormentors.

movies.title: Spider-Man
movies.synopsis: When bitten by a genetically modified spider, a nerdy, shy, and awkward high school student gains spider-like abilities that he eventually must use to fight evil as a superhero after tragedy befalls his family.

movies.title: Spider-Man 2
movies.synopsis: Peter Parker is beset with troubles in his failing personal life as he battles a brilliant scientist named Doctor Otto Octavius.

movies.title: Spider-Man 3
movies.synopsis: A strange black entity from another world bonds with Peter Parker and causes inner turmoil as he contends with new villains, temptations, and revenge.

movies.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
movies.synopsis: After Peter Parker is bitten by a genetically altered spider, he gains newfound, spider-like powers and ventures out to solve the mystery of his parent's mysterious death.

movies.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
movies.synopsis: When New York is put under siege by Oscorp, it is up to Spider-Man to save the city he swore to protect as well as his loved ones.

movies.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
movies.synopsis: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.

movies.title: Spider-Man: Far From Home
movies.synopsis: Following the events of Avengers: Endgame, Spider-Man must step up to take on new threats in a world that has changed forever.

movies.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
movies.synopsis: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

movies.title: Call Me by Your Name
movies.synopsis: In 1980s Italy, a romance blossoms between a seventeen-year-old student and the older man hired as his father's research assistant.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.synopsis: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.
